argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iprodcl.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | iprodcl.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | iprodcl.3 | |- ( ph -> E. n e. Z E. y ( y =/= 0 /\ seq n ( x. , F ) ~~> y ) ) |
| 4 |  | iprodcl.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 5 |  | iprodrecl.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 | #P_iprodclim2 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , F ) ~~> prod_ k e. Z A ) |
| 8 | 4, 5 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) |
| 9 |  | #P_remulcl | |- ( ( k e. RR /\ x e. RR ) -> ( k x. x ) e. RR ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. RR /\ x e. RR ) ) -> ( k x. x ) e. RR ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 8, 10 | #P_seqf | |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , F ) : Z --> RR ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. Z ) -> ( seq M ( x. , F ) ` j ) e. RR ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 7, 12 | #P_climrecl | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. Z A e. RR ) |
